thread.title: Fabio Arimori
thread.title_full: MiniInTheBox 的点评人 Fabio Arimori

author: Fabio Arimori
title: Fabio Arimori
text:
My experience on order #1701111026393379 was really good!
I paid really cheap for the products and they came w/ a really good quality.
Plus, the transportation to Brazil was really fast. I was surprised!
People always think that import products from China is not going to receive a quality product, but I am really impressed! The quality of the products I bought and the transportation was so fast I intend to buy a lot more!
Thanks Miniinthebox!
